ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] EQ Commands updated!
ygData.msgSnippet: here s one I use, that you seem to have missed. /who GUILD all (GUILD has to be in all caps!) this has the effect of /who all  as long as you are
ygData.messageBody:
here's one I use, that you seem to have missed.

/who GUILD all

(GUILD has to be in all caps!)

this has the effect of /who all "<guildname>" as long as you are in a guild.

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
29th Song Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers

----- Original Message -----
From: "Talies the Wanderer" <snicker@...>
To: <Recipient list suppressed>
Sent: Thursday, November 16, 2000 5:58 PM
Subject: [eqbards] EQ Commands updated!


> The most complete page of Everquest commands on the Internet has just been
> revised again. Ever wanted to know all the /pet commands? How about how
> to use the new % variable? It's there. Come to
> http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/everquest/eqcommands.htm and bring your printer
> - you'll want hardcopy.
>
> Talies the Wanderer
> "Still wandering after all these years"
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
